author.bio:
Gavin Johnson is a programmer-turned-product marketer with experience in IT, tech 
consulting, and product marketing. At RudderStack, he leads Product Marketing and is 
helping build the company's open source brand, focusing heavily on increasing both 
community engagement and product awareness. Before joining RudderStack, Gavin attended 
business school at the University of Southern California and earned his bachelor's in 
Computer Science from Oregon State University. Heâ€™s worked for Deloitte Digital as a 
Senior Consultant and Manager, designing and delivering custom applications for 
clients, at AT&T as a Lead Product Marketing Manager for their digital video products, 
and at New Relic as a Principal Product Marketer for everything open source as well as 
their Digital Customer Experience solution. An Oregon native, Gavin now lives in Los 
Angeles. He is happily married, has a purple belt in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, and is a 
photographer, homebrewer, and former marathoner.
author.shortBio:
Product Marketer at RudderStack. Ex-PMM at New Relic & AT&T. Ex-consultant at Deloitte. 
Ex-sys admin. (Sometimes) Ex-developer.
author.name: Gavin Johnson

group.title: Introducing our new RudderStack Pro Self-Serve Plans
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: Announcing the launch of RudderStack's Pro self-serve plans.

group.title: Customer Data Pipelines Play a Key Role in Data Privacy
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: Customer data pipelines play a critical role in the privacy of your customer data. In this post, weâ€™ll explain how your customer data pipeline can help improve your data privacy and how to ensure your data privacy with RudderStack.

group.title: RudderStack is a finalist at SXSW Pitch 2021!
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: SXSW Pitch is the marquee event of South by Southwest Online. Out of more than 500 companies that applied to present at SXSW Pitch 2021, RudderStack was selected as one of the 40 finalists.

group.title: RudderStackâ€™s Licensing Explained
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: Software licensing can be a tricky subject, especially when you are a commercial company building an open-source product like RudderStack. From a customerâ€™s viewpoint, we see how this could be confusing. In this post, weâ€™ll explain how our software is licensed.

group.title: Warehouse-First, the More Secure, Flexible, and Cost-Effective Application Architecture
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: Know what the warehouse-first architecture is, how it works, and whether warehouse-first is the way to go for your data stack.

group.title: Introducing RudderStack Cloud Extract and Warehouse Actions
group.author: Gavin Johnson
group.excerpt: Announcing the launch of our new features, Cloud Extract and Warehouse Actions.
